chargeHist.descr: Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order

result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Elliot Matthews Hanna

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Andrew Joel Golden appeared by video for Elliot Matthews Hanna.  Prosecuting attorney Ryan Jay Michaels in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a plea and sentencing hearing. Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed and read-in to case 22CF1536 for the purpose of sentencing.
Defense counsel requests a plea and sentencing hearing. Plea and sentencing hearing set for 10/14/22 at 3:30 pm. Parties notified via email.
All previously ordered conditions of bail to remain the same.

Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court, defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna not in court, in custody.  Katie Bakunowicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Bail/bond hearing held. Parties stipulate to the cash bail be converted to a signature bond.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 03:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court, defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Status of counsel hearing held. Atty. Andrew Golden has just been appointed. For reasons stated on the record, defense requests Motion hearng date regarding filed motion to strike domestic abuse repeaters and Bail/Bond hearing.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court is in trial on another matter and unable to hear case. Case is being spun to Judge Franke Br 25. Parties notified and sent to room #506, safety building.

Attorney Thomas R. Reed in court, defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Status conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. The PD's Office needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court orders matter adjourned for a status of counsel hearing in Branch 29.  Status conference scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

HELD OFF THE RECORD
Defendant Elliot Hanna in custody.  
Case set for Status. Case following 22cf1536.  Status conference scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

HELD OFF THE RECORD
Defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna not court, defendant in custody. Case set for status following 22CF1536. Matter is adjourned for Status to Preliminay Court.  Status conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Elliot M. Hanna - #2022004875, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for status following 22CF1536. Matter is adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with K.A.R.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Elliot Matthews Hanna in custody.  Ann R. Lopez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Elliot Matthews Hanna appeared by video means with Attorney.  Case retabbed to Branch 29 Lower number case pending.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty. DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.
This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Status conference scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/05/2022@1:30
